UC:UseCase.name: Injured person needs help – 1st responders on the way

Actor.name: Smart Phone
Actor.furtherInformation: A smart phone available at the scene

Actor.name: Traffic Control System
Actor.furtherInformation: System responsible for controlling lights and providing status on the traffic system.

Actor.name: GPS System
Actor.furtherInformation: System of satellites providing location and time reference information.

Actor.name: Cellular Phone Network
Actor.furtherInformation: The network of cellular telephony providing for mobile voice/data communications.

Actor.name: Other vehicles
Actor.furtherInformation: Vehicles using the roads in proximity or in the path of the ambulance.

Assumption.name: String
Assumption.content: The existence of the system components is assumed. They are assumed to be functioning as expected. Organizational responsibilities are pre-existing and functioning as expected. No other extraordinary event is occurring at the same time.
Only analyzing the positive and narrow use case.

KeyPerformanceIndicator.name: Success
KeyPerformanceIndicator.description: Ambulance arrives at injured person in a timely fashion and in line with the accepted practices in emergency response.

BusinessCase.name: Injured person needs help – 1st responders on the way
BusinessCase.description: The goal of this service is to provide medical attention to an injured person. The value of human life justifies the expenditures needed to make this service viable.

Narrative.shortDescription: A person has been injured. The injured person sends a text to e-911 for help. An ambulance is dispatched. A smart GPS combines map data with traffic flow data to route the ambulance. Traffic signals are triggered to assist ambulance in navigation (or negotiating) the route.

Scenario.name: Primary
Scenario.description: This is the primary success case scenario

Precondition.name: ConnectedCellPhone
Precondition.content: Person has cell phone and connectivity

Postcondition.name: AmbulanceArrives
Postcondition.content: An ambulance arrives to help the Person

Step.name: String
Step.description: Person uses cell phone to text for help

Property.value: clock can receive time sync from gps system
